parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Loadouts

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Force animation of bay to given state, -1 for reset to engine handling, can cause weapon inoperative, because weapon is released when bay state <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>1.
<br><br><template><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> While there is no getter to read the animation phase of the given bay, [[animationPhase]] command can be used with the individual bay door name from [[animationNames]] as a workaround. For example for UCAV Sentinel <tt>ucav [[animateBay]] [1, 1]</tt> could be checked with <tt>ucav [[animationPhase]] "weapons_bay_l_1"</tt> or <tt>ucav [[animationPhase]] "weapons_bay_l_2"</tt></value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''animateBay''' [bay, animphase, instant]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [bay, animphase, instant] : [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> bay: [[Number]] - bay index (index starts from 1 and different from pylon index)
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> animphase: [[Number]] - animation phase (0...1)
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> instant (Optional): [[Boolean]] - animate immediately

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[animateBay]] [1, 0.5];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[animateBay]] [1, 1, [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Vehicle Loadouts]],[[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]],[[getPylonMagazines]],[[setAmmoOnPylon]],[[ammoOnPylon]],[[animatePylon]],[[setPylonsPriority]],[[setPylonLoadout]]
</value></part></template></root>
